title: Bacon Dashi

ingredients.name: bacon (raw, preferably thick cut or end pieces from whole slab)

steps: Add all ingredients to a pot.
Heat over medium-low heat until just below a simmer, around 80°C/176°F.
Turn off the heat and allow it to steep for 10 minutes.
Bring up to a simmer, then turn off the heat again, cover, and allow to steep until flavored to your liking, around 30 minutes.
Strain through a fine-mesh strainer and reserve until needed.
notes: This idea is from David Chang and Peter Meehan's cookbook 'Momofuku: a Cookbook'.
Excellent for those who struggle to find Japanese ingredients - the bacon provides smoke and umami in place of katsuobushi.
From 'The Book of Ramen' - Chapter 2: Soup
